Package com.deltadna.android.sdk.ads

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DDNASmartAds.SettingsModifier  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ad<T extends Ad>  
    DDNASmartAds
    Singleton class for accessing the deltaDNA SmartAds SDK.
    DDNASmartAds.Configuration
    Provides a configuration when initialising the SDK through DDNASmartAds.initialise(Configuration) inside of an Application class.
    EngageFactory
    InterstitialAd
    Class for creating and showing an interstitial ad.
    RewardedAd
    Class for creating and showing a rewarded ad.
    Settings
    Settings to be used for SmartAds.
